notes.text:
This update for clone-master-clean-up fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-32000: Fixed some potentially dangerous file system operations (bsc#1181050).

Bugfixes:
- Fixed clone-master-clean-up failing to remove btrfs snapshots (bsc#1203651).

notes.text: A UNIX Symbolic Link (Symlink) Following vulnerability in the clone-master-clean-up.sh script of clone-master-clean-up in SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP3, SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 15 SP1; openSUSE Factory allows local attackers to delete arbitrary files. This issue affects: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP3 clone-master-clean-up version 1.6-4.6.1 and prior versions. SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 15 SP1 clone-master-clean-up version 1.6-3.9.1 and prior versions. openSUSE Factory clone-master-clean-up version 1.6-1.4 and prior versions.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
